survey_brief: This survey aims to evaluate employee satisfaction and comfort with their current digital workspace setup, including hardware, software, and ergonomic factors.

questions.question_text: How satisfied are you with your current workstation setup (desk, chair, monitor, etc.)?
questions.client_notes: Use a 5-point Likert scale for clarity. Ensure mobile-friendly design.

script.question_text: How satisfied are you with your current workstation setup (desk, chair, monitor, etc.)?

questions.question_text: Which of the following ergonomic issues have you experienced in the past 6 months? (Select all that apply)
questions.client_notes: Multi-choice question. Include 'None of the above' to capture no issues.

script.question_text: Which of the following ergonomic issues have you experienced in the past 6 months? (Select all that apply)

questions.question_text: How many hours per day do you typically spend working at your computer?
questions.client_notes: Single-choice question. Useful for correlating with ergonomic issues.

script.question_text: How many hours per day do you typically spend working at your computer?

questions.question_text: Does your employer provide ergonomic assessments or equipment?
answer_options: Yes, and I have used them
Yes, but I have not used them
questions.client_notes: Single-choice question. Helps assess awareness and utilization of employer resources.

script.question_text: Does your employer provide ergonomic assessments or equipment?
answer_options: Yes, and I have used them
Yes, but I have not used them

questions.question_text: What type of monitor setup do you use?
questions.client_notes: Single-choice question. Useful for understanding workspace configurations.

script.question_text: What type of monitor setup do you use?

questions.question_text: How often do you take breaks to stretch or move during your workday?
questions.client_notes: Single-choice question. Helps assess break habits.

script.question_text: How often do you take breaks to stretch or move during your workday?

questions.question_text: Which of the following ergonomic equipment do you currently use? (Select all that apply)
questions.client_notes: Multi-choice question. Useful for understanding current equipment usage.

script.question_text: Which of the following ergonomic equipment do you currently use? (Select all that apply)

questions.question_text: How would you rate the lighting in your workspace?
questions.client_notes: Single-choice question. Use a 5-point Likert scale for clarity.

script.question_text: How would you rate the lighting in your workspace?

questions.question_text: Do you feel your workspace setup negatively impacts your productivity?
questions.client_notes: Single-choice question. Helps assess productivity impact.

script.question_text: Do you feel your workspace setup negatively impacts your productivity?

questions.question_text: What improvements would you suggest for your digital workspace setup?
questions.client_notes: Open-ended question. Allows for detailed feedback.

script.question_text: What improvements would you suggest for your digital workspace setup?
